title: Leadership Summit
description: A summit focused on empowering leaders with skills, strategies, and insights for impactful leadership.

description: A gathering of leaders from diverse fields to share knowledge and foster collaboration.

description: A competition celebrating academic excellence and intellectual skills across various disciplines.

description: An initiative to educate communities on HIV prevention, treatment, and reducing stigma.

description: A workshop to enhance public speaking and hosting skills for professional and social events.

description: A creative competition to design logos that capture the essence of leadership of the JRU-CSC.
